definition.script:
pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { APPLICATION_NAME = "CAMPP_Selenium_Test" NOTIFYUSERS = 'sreem@newtglobalcorp.com,syed.h@newtglobalcorp.com,maheshm@newtglobal.com,madhavi@newtglobal.com,kavyasrim@newtglobal.com,pranavkorde@newtglobal.com,pankajkumar@newtglobal.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 2, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout") { steps { deleteDir() echo "Checkout the code" git branch: "Jenkins_fix", credentialsId: 'newtglobaladmin', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/CAMPP_UI_Test.git' } } stage ("Running Tests") { steps { sh "env webdriver.chrome.driver=/usr/bin/chromedrive" sh "export isRunningFromJenkins=true" echo "------------------------Running Selenium testcases--------------------------------" sh "pwd" sh "ls -l" sh "mvn -f /home/jenkins/workspace/CAMPP/CAMPP_Selenium_Testing clean compile test" } } } post { always { emailext attachmentsPattern: 'target/surefire-reports/emailable-report.html', subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${APPLICATION_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS} BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } } }
